scripts.exec: mkdir -p build/proof && node --max-old-space-size=524288 src/main_executor tools/build-genesis/input_executor.json -p pil/main.pil -r ../zkevm-rom/build/rom.json -o build/proof/zkevm.commit && cp build/rom.json tools/build-genesis/input_executor.json build/proof
scripts.buildstarkinfo: mkdir -p build/proof && node --max-old-space-size=524288 node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_genstarkinfo.js  -p pil/main.pil -s src/zkevm.starkstruct.json -i build/proof/zkevm.starkinfo.json && cp src/zkevm.starkstruct.json build/proof
scripts.buildchelpers: mkdir -p build/proof && node --max-old-space-size=524288 node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_buildchelpers.js  -p pil/main.pil -s src/zkevm.starkstruct.json -c build/proof/zkevm.chelpers.cpp
scripts.buildconstanttree: mkdir -p build/proof && node --trace-gc --trace-gc-ignore-scavenger --max-semi-space-size=1024 --max-old-space-size=32000 node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_buildconsttree.js  -c build/proof/zkevm.const -p pil/main.pil -s src/zkevm.starkstruct.json -t build/proof/zkevm.consttree -v build/proof/zkevm.verkey.json
scripts.prove: mkdir -p build/proof && node --trace-gc --trace-gc-ignore-scavenger --max-semi-space-size=1024 --max-old-space-size=128000 node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_prover.js  -m build/proof/zkevm.commit  -c build/proof/zkevm.const -t build/proof/zkevm.consttree -p pil/main.pil -s src/zkevm.starkstruct.json -o build/proof/zkevm.proof.json -z build/proof/zkevm.zkin.proof.json -b build/proof/zkevm.public.json
scripts.verify: mkdir -p build/proof && node --trace-gc --trace-gc-ignore-scavenger --max-semi-space-size=1024 --max-old-space-size=128000 node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_verifier.js  -p pil/main.pil -s src/zkevm.starkstruct.json -o build/proof/zkevm.proof.json -b build/proof/zkevm.public.json -v build/proof/zkevm.verkey.json
scripts.gencircom: mkdir -p build/proof && node node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_pil2circom.js  -p pil/main.pil -s src/zkevm.starkstruct.json -v build/proof/zkevm.verkey.json -o build/proof/zkevm.verifier.circom
scripts.c12setup: mkdir -p build/proof && node --trace-gc --trace-gc-ignore-scavenger --max-semi-space-size=1024 --max-old-space-size=128000 node_modules/pil-stark/src/compressor12/main_compressor12_setup.js  -r build/proof/zkevm.verifier.r1cs  -p build/proof/zkevm.c12.pil -c build/proof/zkevm.c12.const -e build/proof/zkevm.c12.exec
scripts.c12buildstarkinfo: mkdir -p build/proof && node --max-old-space-size=524288 node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_genstarkinfo.js  -p build/proof/zkevm.c12.pil  -s src/zkevm.c12.starkstruct.json -i build/proof/zkevm.c12.starkinfo.json && cp src/zkevm.c12.starkstruct.json build/proof
scripts.c12buildchelpers: mkdir -p build/proof && node --max-old-space-size=524288 node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_buildchelpers.js  -p build/proof/zkevm.c12.pil  -s src/zkevm.c12.starkstruct.json -c build/proof/zkevm.c12.chelpers.cpp
scripts.c12exec: mkdir -p build/proof && node --max-old-space-size=524288 node_modules/pil-stark/src/compressor12/main_compressor12_exec.js -i build/proof/zkevm.zkin.proof.json -w build/proof/zkevm.verifier_js/zkevm.verifier.wasm -p build/proof/zkevm.c12.pil -e build/proof/zkevm.c12.exec -m build/proof/zkevm.c12.commit
scripts.c12buildconstanttree: mkdir -p build/proof && node --trace-gc --trace-gc-ignore-scavenger --max-semi-space-size=1024 --max-old-space-size=32000 node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_buildconsttree.js  -c build/proof/zkevm.c12.const -p build/proof/zkevm.c12.pil -s src/zkevm.c12.starkstruct.json -t build/proof/zkevm.c12.consttree -v build/proof/zkevm.c12.verkey.json
scripts.c12prove: mkdir -p build/proof && node --trace-gc --trace-gc-ignore-scavenger --max-semi-space-size=1024 --max-old-space-size=128000 node_modules/pil-stark/src/main_prover.js  -m build/proof/zkevm.c12.commit  -c build/proof/zkevm.c12.const -t build/proof/zkevm.c12.consttree -p build/proof/zkevm.c12.pil -s src/zkevm.c12.starkstruct.json -o build/proof/zkevm.c12.proof.json -z build/proof/zkevm.c12.zkin.proof.json -b build/proof/zkevm.c12.public.json
